title: USA Today recommends Belize as a wedding destination
text:
About Belize , Belize Wedding | July 6,   
Destinations weddings are popular options for those who long for a beach-front wedding, but they can also be expensive. An article appearing in USA Today , however, highlights several locations that are beautiful and budget friendly, chief among them being Belize . 
Belize boasts lovely sand-covered beaches, the second-largest barrier reef on Earth, pristine rainforests, and plenty of Mayan ruins to explore. You can also find affordable lodgings at any of the popular destinations in the country. 
And since lobster is much cheaper here, you’ll have the chance to wow your wedding guests with a fancy meal for a fraction of the cost. 
Here are some Belize wedding resorts that offer plenty of extras at a reasonable cost: 
Victoria House 
You can secure a wedding package at Victoria House filled with tons of perks for $1,375 during the summer season. Extras include your marriage license, cake, officiate fees and bunches of island flowers to make your ceremony extra special. 
Chabil Mar 
Chabil Mar is a one-stop shop – the wedding packages here include a honeymoon suite, champagne, massages, dinner for two and an intimate reception at either the garden, pool or beach. 
Yok Ha Island Resort 
During the summer season at Yok Ha Island Resort, you can book a basic Belize wedding package for $1,575 . It includes the license, officiate fees, flowers, cake, champagne and a wedding photographer to capture your first moments as husband and wife. 
Portofino 
Select the dream beach package at Portofino and you’ll have the services of a wedding coordinator along with your license, associated fees, flowers and the ceremony itself. Book in the off-season to get all of this and more for $1,470. 
Laru Beya Resort and Villas 
Plan a gorgeous wedding and a week-long honeymoon here for $4,138 during the off-season . Cake and flowers are included for the ceremony, as is a day-long snorkeling excursion. After the wedding, relax for the week with massages and fantastic meals in an oceanfront suite. 
Cahal Pech Village Resort 
Get married before the Belize River Valley at Cahal Pech . Need help obtaining the marriage license or securing a photographer? Just sit back and let the wedding planners take care of everything! 
Whether you’re planning an intimate ceremony or a grand event, you’re sure to find the perfect spot in Belize, where you won’t break the bank in exchange for a picture perfect wedding day!
